column2: Improve description of "Type can be weakened" inspection

column3:
Bold font should be used to draw attention. Type names and method names
are not the important eye catchers here, it's the names of the
configuration knobs.
Applied manually to Master with some minor changes, thanks for your contribution! I like how the unclear "use the second checkbox to..." was improved.
Improve description of "Type can be weakened" inspection
